summary: Every Volcanic Tundra loving hunter knows this problem: No home in the tundra though it\\\\\\\'s so damn beautiful there. This mod is the solution for your problems.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s a small house... maybe more just a shack in the trees in the volcanic tundra. And when I say small I mean really tiny. It contains:
- 1 bedroll (single)
- 2 sacks
- 1 backpack
- 1 chest
- 1 cooking pot
- 1 hunting bow

On the roof is a small terrace with a chest 2 chairs a table and a few bottles of mead.
Don\'t blame me for \"agh it\'s so tiny maaan\"
It is supposed to be small. It\'s not a giant manor or castle (those will follow soon) It\'s a hunter\'s shack and a hunter doesn\'t need much.


The entrance to the shack on the trees is at the bottom of the tree that holds the shack. If you don\'t find it wait till night. There\'s a candle next to the trapdoor.

Sorry for not using map markers. I just don\'t know how to place and edit one.

Questions or problems? Message me.
author: LadyMassaca
